text.tspan: - it is also possible to control the
order of rendering the layers to slides
- by default the substring layers will be
rendered first making the layer itself
- this can be used recursively as 'beta3.'
searches for substrings in other layers
- this is useful for keeping the
- in this slide set the contents of
the first layer '#beta' will be drawn
below all layers that begin with 'beta'
- this is a regular slide set
